An intern reused a prime in the RSA keys for encrypting secret flags. Can you exploit this and decrypt the flag? Ciphertext: 786238114206442201235626213888103993532808458812461261709409164782442935375657295237692896545287772264148925961642772264171471064468602350014143068229774280518680336780359950678932119161847092161632207801133955151357768312310664834

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1372076860241598950484808089126405677543142448516084649896466915180290840310937037614620617495954156357023647374686479112634203516892676865015984342077149075120306521568510942172768717526734582885788233246673057122495745879162017001, e=83557455353612937090427905744604959293073266473781547412316394327803474834830772721009845856722790171467543403504275725192687797076205423826180545762833905725214601668851714219207827634432048250363842658376503080840285460402784383

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{oy8le8cr}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 786238114206442201235626213888103993532808458812461261709409164782442935375657295237692896545287772264148925961642772264171471064468602350014143068229774280518680336780359950678932119161847092161632207801133955151357768312310664834
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1372076860241598950484808089126405677543142448516084649896466915180290840310937037614620617495954156357023647374686479112634203516892676865015984342077149075120306521568510942172768717526734582885788233246673057122495745879162017001, e=83557455353612937090427905744604959293073266473781547412316394327803474834830772721009845856722790171467543403504275725192687797076205423826180545762833905725214601668851714219207827634432048250363842658376503080840285460402784383
extra_info: p=37041555856113805394427424850264163480012279053546660643267014697330690380428107521981105260817681498594800294883501, q=37041555856113805394427424850264163480012279053546660643267014697330690380428107521981105260817681498594800294883501, Ï†(n)=1372076860241598950484808089126405677543142448516084649896466915180290840310937037614620617495954156357023647374686405029522491289281888010166283813750189050562199428247224408143374056145973726670744271036151421759498556278572250000
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
